price: Na siku zitapo funguka mbingu kwa mawingu, na wateremshwe Malaika kwa wingi,
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Itaje Siku itapo pasuka mbingu na ikafunguka, na yakadhihiri kati yake mawingu, na Malaika wakashuka khasa kwa yakini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayawma tashaqqaqu al-samāu bil-ghamāmi wanuzzila al-malāikatu tanzīlan
